articles.title: Israel warns of ‘prolonged campaign’ against Iran as Europeans push for truce - Financial Times
articles.description: Foreign ministers hold Geneva talks in bid to end war and keep US out of conflict

articles.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Trump weighs negotiations; European ministers to meet for Iran talks - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he will wait up to two weeks to decide whether to attack Tehran’s nuclear program, as Israel and Iran continued to trade fire.
articles.content: Moshe Carmon, a resident of the Israeli city of Beersheba, told The Washington Post that his apartment, located on the first floor of a residential building, was damaged by Fridays Iranian missile la… [+267 chars]
